name: Junk Yard Fights
description:
Made for Boss Rush Jam 2023.

Let me know if you like the game. There is only one boss at the moment, but all mechanics are scalable for future additions. There is tutorial level as well.

Controls:
  • WASD to Move/ Jump / Crouch
  • Mouse to Aim
  • Left Mouse to Attack

In order to kill the boss, you have to destroy the attached crystals (which disable some of his attacks). Destroy all the RED ones first, then the BLUE one.

Team: 

Just myself :)
